max-packet-size.help: Max serialized MQTT packet size, set by template parameter in paho library.

max-connections.help: Max simultaneous connections, set by template parameter in paho library.

tests-broker-hostname.help: Name or address of the broker server hostname.

tests-topic.help: Name of the public test topic that publishes message frequently. Required for *_SUBSCRIBE_RECEIVE tests.

tests-public-topic-enable.help: Set to true if there is a publicly available topic that gets messages posted frequently. See tests-public-topic-name. Required for *_SUBSCRIBE_RECEIVE tests.

tests-public-topic-name.help: Name of the public test topic that publishes message frequently. Required for *_SUBSCRIBE_RECEIVE tests.

tests-mqtt-sn-enable.help: Set to true if an MQTT-SN Gateway is available.

tests-username-password-protection-enabl.help: Set to true if the MQTT broker has username/password protection enabled. Provide the username and password in tests-username and tests-password.

tests-tls-enable.help: Set to true if the MQTT broker has TLS protection enabled. NOTE: you need to set certificate in mqtt_global::SSL_CA_PEM.

tests-username.help: MQTT messages username. To be used in the *USER_PASSWORD* tests. See also tests-username-always

tests-password.help: MQTT messages password. To be used in the *USER_PASSWORD* tests. See also tests-username-always

tests-username-always.help: Always attach the username and password to messages (some brokers require this).
